content: Bank Account Savings Asked by AnonymousAsked on 14 May 2019Is it worth to make a switch to DBS multiplier?I have 50k in ocbc 360 and have been earning salary, step up and boost bonuses in recent months. How much is the effective interest(in %) am I earning considering the 2 different tiers for first 35k and the next 35k? If I make the switch to DBS , I will be able to earn 2.2% p.a (fulfill salary credit + transactions in 2 categories).1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Clarence Chua, Financial Planning Specialist at Prudential Assurance SingaporeTop Contributor (Sep)Level 7. Grand MasterAnswered on 15 May 2019Hey there, you may want to consider UOB ONE if your spendings are 500-2,000 per month.Check out a Seedly article regarding bank comparison here
